Articles.Content: WHY YOUTUBE WHHHHHHYYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WHY U HAVE TO ADD HASHTAGS!!!!!!! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!! But seriously look at Youtube. They integrated Google Plus now, so Youtube is basicly like Instagram. Yep
